= exSearchComplete =

== Intro ==
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

exSearchComplete is just a tiny script handle search complete with `/`, when you press `/`
and type some words for search, you can press `<TAB>` to find matched results. Cause it 
support partial complete, that make it a little bit different than the 
[http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=2222 cmdline-complete] plugin.
